name: context-seed
description: PRD-to-packages seeding skill — dynamically fetches the live template registry and maps project requirements to npx trinity369/use commands. Never goes stale.
postMessage:
Context Seed skill installed at .claude/skills/context-seed/SKILL.md

Usage: Feed your PRD or describe your project. The skill fetches the live template registry and recommends the right packages.

No hardcoded catalog — new templates are picked up automatically.
